response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $9,500. This price reflects the product's worth and also allows me to make a fair profit. I understand it might be a bit above your initial expectations, but given its high value to you, I believe this is a reasonable offer. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if there's anything else I can assist you with.", "product_price": 9500}
